slides.title: 80+ Customizable CSS Variables
slides.subtitle: Full control over colors, typography, effects, and component styling
slides.notes:
# ThemeConfig Overview

The new theming system provides 80+ CSS custom properties organized in categories:

## Categories
- **colors**: 25+ color tokens (primary, secondary, accent, background, surface, text, semantic states, gradients)
- **typography**: Font families (heading, body, mono), sizes (xs-7xl), weights (light-extrabold), line heights, letter spacing
- **spacing**: 9 tokens (none, xs, sm, md, lg, xl, 2xl, 3xl, 4xl)
- **borderRadius**: 8 tokens (none, sm, md, lg, xl, 2xl, 3xl, full)
- **effects**: Gradients, shadows, glass, orb, animations
- **components**: Button, card, timeline, tag, progress bar specific tokens

## Usage
Set in meta.themeConfig with any subset of options.

slides.notes:
# Color Tokens Reference

## Core Colors
- `primary`: Main brand color, used for accents and CTAs
- `secondary`: Complementary brand color
- `accent`: Tertiary highlight color
- `background`: Main slide background (#0c0a1d in this theme)
- `surface`: Cards, panels, elevated surfaces (#1a1625)
- `text`: Primary text color (#f3e8ff)
- `textSecondary`: Secondary body text
- `muted`: Subdued text, captions

## State Colors
- `success`: Positive actions, confirmations
- `warning`: Caution states
- `danger`: Errors, destructive actions
- `info`: Informational highlights

## Gradient Colors
- `gradientFrom`: Starting color
- `gradientVia`: Middle color (optional)
- `gradientTo`: Ending color

All hex colors automatically generate --lumina-color-{name}-rgb CSS variables.

slides.title: Effects Configuration
slides.subtitle: Visual enhancements for premium feel
slides.notes:
# Effects Configuration

## Gradients
- `useGradients`: boolean - Master toggle
- `gradientDirection`: Direction enum
  - 'to-t' (top), 'to-b' (bottom), 'to-l' (left), 'to-r' (right)
  - 'to-tl', 'to-tr', 'to-bl', 'to-br' (diagonals)

## Shadows
- `useShadows`: boolean
- `shadowIntensity`: 'none' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl' | '2xl'
- `shadowColor`: Any CSS color string

## Glassmorphism
- `useGlass`: boolean - Frosted glass panels
- `glassOpacity`: 0-1 (default 0.03)
- `glassBlur`: CSS blur value (default '20px')
- `glassBorderOpacity`: 0-1 for subtle borders

## Ambient Orb
- `useOrb`: boolean - Background glow effect
- `orbOpacity`: 0-1 (default 0.4)
- `orbBlur`: CSS blur (default '120px')
- `orbSize`: CSS size (default '60vw')

## Animations
- `animationsEnabled`: Master toggle
- `transitionDuration`: Default '0.3s'
- `transitionEasing`: CSS easing function
- `hoverScale`: Scale on hover (default 1.05)

slides.title: Component Tokens
slides.subtitle: Fine-tune individual UI components
slides.notes:
# Component-Specific Tokens

## Buttons
- `buttonRadius`: Border radius (default '9999px' = pill)
- `buttonPadding`: CSS padding (default '0.75rem 1.5rem')
- `buttonFontWeight`: Number 100-900 (default 700)
- `buttonTextTransform`: 'none' | 'uppercase' | 'capitalize'

## Cards
- `cardRadius`: Border radius (default '1.5rem')
- `cardPadding`: CSS padding (default '2rem')
- `cardBorderWidth`: Border thickness (default '1px')
- `cardBackground`: Override background color

## Timeline
- `timelineNodeSize`: Node diameter (default '1rem')
- `timelineLineWidth`: Connecting line width (default '2px')
- `timelineNodeColor`: Node color (defaults to primary)
- `timelineLineColor`: Line color (defaults to border)

## Tags/Badges
- `tagPadding`: CSS padding (default '0.25rem 1rem')
- `tagRadius`: Border radius (default '9999px')
- `tagFontSize`: Font size (default '0.75rem')

## Progress Bars
- `progressHeight`: Height (default '0.5rem')
- `progressRadius`: Border radius (default '9999px')
- `progressBackground`: Track color
- `progressFill`: Fill color

slides.notes:
# Typography Tokens

## Font Families
- `typography.fontFamily.heading`: Headings (default 'Inter, sans-serif')
- `typography.fontFamily.body`: Body text (default 'Inter, sans-serif')
- `typography.fontFamily.mono`: Code (default 'monospace')

## Font Sizes (CSS Variables: --lumina-text-*)
- xs: 0.75rem | sm: 0.875rem | base: 1rem
- lg: 1.125rem | xl: 1.25rem | 2xl: 1.5rem
- 3xl: 1.875rem | 4xl: 2.25rem | 5xl: 3rem
- 6xl: 3.75rem | 7xl: 4.5rem

## Font Weights (CSS Variables: --lumina-font-weight-*)
- light: 300 | normal: 400 | medium: 500
- semibold: 600 | bold: 700 | extrabold: 800

## Line Heights (CSS Variables: --lumina-leading-*)
- tight: 1.1 | snug: 1.25 | normal: 1.5
- relaxed: 1.625 | loose: 2

## Letter Spacing (CSS Variables: --lumina-tracking-*)
- tighter: -0.05em | tight: -0.025em | normal: 0
- wide: 0.025em | wider: 0.05em | widest: 0.1em

# Spacing Tokens (CSS Variables: --lumina-space-*)
none: 0 | xs: 0.25rem | sm: 0.5rem | md: 1rem
lg: 1.5rem | xl: 2rem | 2xl: 3rem | 3xl: 4rem | 4xl: 6rem

# Border Radius (CSS Variables: --lumina-radius-*)
none: 0 | sm: 0.25rem | md: 0.5rem | lg: 0.75rem
xl: 1rem | 2xl: 1.5rem | 3xl: 2rem | full: 9999px

slides.title: Start with a Preset, Override What You Need
slides.subtitle: Use theme: 'preset' + themeConfig for partial overrides. Lumina deep-merges your changes.
slides.notes:
# Quick Reference

## Preset Names
- `default`: Blue on dark
- `ocean`: Cyan on slate
- `midnight`: Indigo on black
- `forest`: Emerald on dark green
- `cyber`: Pink on zinc
- `latte`: Amber on cream (light mode)
- `sunset`: Orange-rose gradient
- `monochrome`: Black and white

## Minimal Override Example
```json
{
  "meta": {
    "theme": "midnight",
    "themeConfig": {
      "colors": { "primary": "#ff6b6b" }
    }
  }
}
```

## Full Custom Example
See this deck's meta.themeConfig for all available options.

## CSS Variables
All tokens are exposed as --lumina-* CSS custom properties for external styling.
